sentence.Network_en: Surely my existence cannot be so purposeless?
sentence.Network_cn: 当然我的存在不能如此没有意义吧？

sentence.Network_en: Time may also be wasted in purposeless meetings.
sentence.Network_cn: 时间也可能浪费在毫无意义的会议当中。

sentence.Network_en: He came alive to me, delivered suddenly from the womb of his purposeless splendor.
sentence.Network_cn: 盖茨比在我眼中有了生命, 忽然之间从他那子宫般的毫无目的的豪华里分娩了出来.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(P) ... purposeful 有目的 purposeless 无目的 purposely 故意地.
small talk ... ⑥purposeful adj. 有清晰目的的，坚决的 ⑦purposeless adj. 无目的的，无意义的 ⑧purposely adv. 故意地.
...理念，就是基于无意义性（meaningless）和无目的性（purposeless）的。”这就是所谓后现代主义思想特征在建筑领域的一个体现。

list.abs: a pointless remark ; a life essentially purposeless ; senseless violence ., 无意义的评论 ; 本质上无意义的生活 ; 无意义的暴力.
hyped the country up to a purposeless pitch ( bNewsweek )刺激这个国家到一个无意义的高度(b新闻周刊)
of contras），以及行为的失去目标感（the feeling of purposelessness），引起了与狗的习惯服从相冲突的不愉快情绪。

entry.def: If an action is purposeless, it does not seem to have a sensible purpose.

example.ex: Time may also be wasted in purposeless meetings...
example.tran: 时间也可能浪费在毫无意义的会议当中。

example.ex: Surely my existence cannot be so purposeless?
example.tran: 当然我的存在不能如此没有意义吧？

means.word_mean: 1. not evidencing any purpose of goal

auth_sentence.content: I began to resent...a purposeless infringement of my freedom.
auth_sentence.res_content: I began to resent...a purposeless infringement of my freedom.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I began to resent...a purposeless infringement of my freedom.

auth_sentence.content: Of course, the frictions they target are not purposeless.
auth_sentence.res_content: Of course, the frictions they target are not purposeless.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Of course, the frictions they target are not purposeless.

auth_sentence.content: The only purposeless tissues in any living thing anywhere are vestigial, which means they formerly had a purpose.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The only purposeless tissues in any living thing anywhere are vestigial, which means they formerly had a purpose.
